sentences.english: Okay now we got a quarter of an hour for questions.
sentences.chinese: 好，我們有一刻鐘的時間作爲問答環節。

sentences.english: The application of QA system based on the Frequently Asked Questions(FAQ) is becoming more and more extensive simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 同時基於常問問題集的問答系統的應用也越來越廣泛。

sentences.english: Conference call Q&As are a confusing and cryptic dance.
sentences.chinese: 公司的電話會議上的問答階段像個混亂和神祕的舞蹈。

sentences.english: For the rest of time, please ask and answer the questions with your desk mates about the text.
sentences.chinese: 用剩餘的時間，同桌間就課文內容進行相互問答。

sentences.english: CQAES (Chinese Question-Answer Experimental System) is a chinese natural language understanding system.
sentences.chinese: 是一箇中文自然語言理解問答系統。

sentences.english: Will a flood of new users dilute the quality of the Q&A site?
sentences.chinese: 大量的新增用戶是否會降低問答站點的質量？

sentences.english: Demonstration of the map on selected cancer for keywords.
sentences.chinese: 看圖並根據示範進行問答。

sentences.english: The demo over, it was time for player Q&A.
sentences.chinese: 預告結束，現在是問答時間。

sentences.english: Being recorded on video also made a real difference.
sentences.chinese: 問答過程被錄成視頻也對結果產生了很大影響。

sentences.english: You can now prepare more pages of questions and answers and memorize them.
sentences.chinese: 現在你可以製作更多問答頁，然後進行記憶。

sentences.english: I've already doped out today's award-winning question.
sentences.chinese: 今天的有獎問答題我已經想好了。

sentences.english: Then the QA query results are re-ranked by question class information.
sentences.chinese: 進而通過問題類別信息，對問答查詢結果重新排序。

sentences.english: The day before yesterday, our class held a quiz.
sentences.chinese: 前兩天，我們班搞了一個有獎問答。

sentences.english: During the Q&A session, Iwata noted that he did not actually state this.
sentences.chinese: 在問答環節，巖田聡自己卻表示並沒有這樣說過。
趕快來給大家出今天的有獎問答題吧。

definition: current trends/the present situation/how things are going
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to question/to ask/to raise a question
